name: PropelAuth
headline: Team-based authentication for B2B SaaS
description:
PropelAuth provides the right level of authentication for all stages of a company. New startups can use our hosted pre-built UIs which provide the simplest possible integration. Out of the box, our customers immediately have the same auth experience as large tech companies like Slack. As those startups grow, they can use our APIs and component libraries to pull aspects of the experience into their product.

More than just authentication, we will also provide useful functions tied to a "user" or "organization", like analytics, billing/subscriptions, referral programs, etc.

founders.name: Andrew Israel, Founder
founders.description:
Andrew is the founder and CEO of PropelAuth. He has more than 10 years experience building software and leading teams for companies like Palantir, SafeGraph, and Clockwise.  He first started writing code in the 6th grade.
In his free time, you can find him playing chess or hiking with his dog.

[Announcing ui.propelauth.com - the easiest way to customize your auth pages](https://www.propelauth.com/<https:/www.propelauth.com/post/announcing-ui-propelauth-com>)
# Authentication your whole company will love
Easy integration and straightforward APIs for developers. Built-in user management for customer-facing teams.Data and insights for PMs and executives.
[Get started →](https://www.propelauth.com/<https:/auth.propelauth.com/signup>)
[Read the docs ](https://www.propelauth.com/<https:/docs.propelauth.com>)
Backed by![Y Combinator](https://www.propelauth.com/images/yc-logo.svg)
## POWERING AUTH FOR HUNDREDS OF B2B BUSINESSES OF ALL SIZES
  * ![logo](https://www.propelauth.com/images/logos/mercoa-logo.svg)
  * ![logo](https://www.propelauth.com/images/logos/jamsocket.png)
  * ![logo](https://www.propelauth.com/images/logos/reducto.png)
  * ![logo](https://www.propelauth.com/images/logos/duro-logo.png)
  * ![logo](https://www.propelauth.com/images/logos/brilliant-earth.png)
  * ![logo](https://www.propelauth.com/images/logos/tennr-2.png)
  * ![logo](https://www.propelauth.com/images/logos/letterailogo.png)
  * ![logo](https://www.propelauth.com/images/logos/byteratlogo.png)
  * ![logo](https://www.propelauth.com/images/logos/kintsugi.png)
  * ![logo](https://www.propelauth.com/images/logos/octomindlogo.png)


  * ![logo](https://www.propelauth.com/images/logos/mercoa-logo.svg)
  * ![logo](https://www.propelauth.com/images/logos/jamsocket.png)
  * ![logo](https://www.propelauth.com/images/logos/reducto.png)
  * ![logo](https://www.propelauth.com/images/logos/duro-logo.png)
  * ![logo](https://www.propelauth.com/images/logos/brilliant-earth.png)
  * ![logo](https://www.propelauth.com/images/logos/tennr-2.png)
  * ![logo](https://www.propelauth.com/images/logos/letterailogo.png)
  * ![logo](https://www.propelauth.com/images/logos/byteratlogo.png)
  * ![logo](https://www.propelauth.com/images/logos/kintsugi.png)
  * ![logo](https://www.propelauth.com/images/logos/octomindlogo.png)


Our philosophy
## We take a pragmatic approach to auth
PropelAuth was founded on the idea that a great auth product gets out of your way. We provide you with the right tools out of the box—so you can quickly make your users' experiences as secure and smooth as possible.
Ask Your Developer... Once
As soon as you start onboarding users, your team will have a laundry list of things they need to do or see, like:
  * "Can you pull me a list of all users who signed up today?"
  * "I can’t figure out what this user is talking about, maybe we can take a look in the database?"
  * "Hey, this user needs their password reset!"

When you have PropelAuth the answer becomes "Oh, you can do that yourself, here’s how…" and soon you'll find yourself with more free time.
  * ![Image of the dashboard](https://www.propelauth.com/images/full-dashboard.png)
  * ![List of reports](https://www.propelauth.com/images/reports.png)


Built for B2B
## Everything you need to support your customers, small and large
##### Organizations
Organizations are a first-class concept in PropelAuth. You can use our UIs to get started quickly, or build your own with our APIs.
![Screenshots of the product](https://www.propelauth.com/images/billing.py.png)
##### Roles & Permissions (RBAC)
Start with our default roles, or create your own. We even handle updating existing users when you make changes.
![Screenshots of the product](https://www.propelauth.com/images/rbac-3.png)
##### SSO / SAML Guides
The easiest way to integrate with identity providers, like Okta and Azure AD. We provide guides for your users to set up and test their configuration.
![Screenshots of the product](https://www.propelauth.com/images/saml-guide.png)
##### Advanced Security Features
Set custom session durations per organization, enforce MFA, and more. We handle the complexity so you don't have to.
![Screenshots of the product](https://www.propelauth.com/images/require_mfa.png)
##### Audit Logs
Get a full understandind of activity across your users and organizations using audit logging.
![Screenshots of the product](https://www.propelauth.com/images/audit-log.png)
##### Data Explorer (Beta)
Don't just onboard your users - understand them. Get information about the companies and employees signing up for your product.
![Screenshots of the product](https://www.propelauth.com/images/data-explorer-large.png)
Define your user schema and we’ll do the rest.
This can be as simple as 
```
{email, first_name, last_name}
```
or as complex as you’d like.
UIs included.
    We provide a complete set of UIs for signup, login, password reset, account, and more. Your UIs will automatically adapt to your schema.
Or do it yourself.
    Our UIs are a great place to start, but you can also build your own. We provide APIs for that.
Works with SSO/SAML.
    We ensure that when the user hits your product, you'll have a standardized view of them, regardless of if they logged in via password, magic link, SSO/SAML, etc.
  * ![Split screen](https://www.propelauth.com/images/signup-schema-update.png)
  * ![Split screen](https://www.propelauth.com/images/signup-schema-complete-account.png)


## Founders choose us
Let's hear a few reasons why.
> “PropelAuth solves for everything that Auth0 fails at. As a B2B SaaS company, I have never come across a tool that works as well as PropelAuth does when it comes to authentication needs. The API documentation, the customer support and the overall experience is unparalleled. Hands down, one of the best products I have ever used. 11/10 would recommend.”
Pujun Bhatnagar
[Kintsugi, Founder](https://www.propelauth.com/<https:/trykintsugi.com>)
> “First, I just want to mention that the SAML feature is awesome. We had a customer spring it on us as a last minute need and were able to get their IT folks through the process to set up the integration with effectively no notice. PropelAuth was a life saver there, and just wanted to share that bit of appreciation with you and the team.”
Tyler Johnson
[Tennr, Founder](https://www.propelauth.com/<https:/www.tennr.com>)
> “Incredibly easy set up, new features dropped all the time. [The team] has been fantastic every step of the way. I cannot recommend PropelAuth highly enough”
Stephen Campbell
[Revamp, Founder](https://www.propelauth.com/<https:/getrevamp.ai>)
> “We're really thankful for you guys - have been a massive help in getting our product out... my last startup rolled our own auth server and spent in aggregate a month handling this stuff. You guys are definitely solving a need.”
Stealth Founder
in the LegalTech Space
> “PropelAuth is becoming a critical part of my day, and I genuinely love the product (and the rate of improvement!)”
Noah Lebovic
[FlowDeploy, Founder](https://www.propelauth.com/<https:/flowdeploy.com>)
> “[PropelAuth] allowed us to focus on our main product features, while not worrying about the auth portion. We were able to dedicate our engineering resources to our product while keeping our infrastructure simple.”
Josh Gray
[Artemis, Founder](https://www.propelauth.com/<https:/www.artemisdata.io>)
> “We’re using Propelauth for authentication, and it’s been fantastic. The organization, user management, and everything else is top-notch, and I’m thrilled with my decision to use it.”
Stealth Founder
## Built by Introverts
[View Pricing →](https://www.propelauth.com/</pricing>)
Straight-forward, transparent pricing. No surprises.
When you need help, you’ll get support, not a sales pitch.
## PropelAuth
![PropelAuth](https://www.propelauth.com/images/logo.svg)
[Twitter](https://www.propelauth.com/<https:/twitter.com/propelauth>)[GitHub](https://www.propelauth.com/<https:/github.com/propelauth>)[YouTube](https://www.propelauth.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/@propelauth>)

  * [Compare vs Clerk](https://www.propelauth.com/</compare/clerk>)


### Documentation
  * [Docs](https://www.propelauth.com/<https:/docs.propelauth.com/>)

  * [Blog](https://www.propelauth.com/</blog>)
  * Support
  * [Status](https://www.propelauth.com/<https:/propelauth.instatus.com/>)


### Company
  * [About](https://www.propelauth.com/</about>)

generated_description:
### PropelAuth: Streamlined Authentication for B2B SaaS

**Founded:** 2021  
**Location:** California  
**Team Size:** 6 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W22  
**Website:** [propelauth.com](https://www.propelauth.com)  

---

PropelAuth is a fresh player in the B2B SaaS world, focusing on team-based authentication solutions that cater to businesses at all stages. The company’s core mission is to make authentication simple, accessible, and effective for SaaS products, all while leveling the playing field between startups and established tech giants like Slack.

**Key Offering:**  
PropelAuth offers hosted, pre-built user interfaces that facilitate straightforward integration for new SaaS startups. This means that right out the door, startups can provide an authentication experience that rivals larger companies, allowing them to focus more on growing their business and less on backend development.

**More Than Just Authentication:**  
What sets PropelAuth apart is its commitment to offering more than basic authentication. Alongside user management, they provide essential functions like analytics, billing, subscriptions, and referral programs. This comprehensive approach helps businesses not only manage user identities but also understand their customers better.

**Unique Features:**
- **Customization:** Startups can leverage PropelAuth’s APIs and libraries to gradually integrate various aspects of authentication into their products as they scale.
- **Built-in Management Tools:** They offer advanced security features, such as multi-factor authentication (MFA), customizable session durations, and audit logs, ensuring both security and compliance are handled seamlessly.
- **User-Centric Design:** The platform intelligently adapts UI elements based on the user schema, making it easy for developers to implement.

**Testimonials:**  
Founders from companies like Kintsugi and Tennr praise PropelAuth for addressing the gaps left by other authentication tools, particularly noting its ease of setup, excellent customer support, and rapid feature delivery.

**Culture and Philosophy:**  
With a tagline suggesting they're "built by introverts," PropelAuth takes a pragmatic approach to development. They believe that a good authentication system should get out of the way, providing tools that help teams focus on what truly matters—delivering value to their users.

Whether you're a budding startup or an established B2B company, PropelAuth positions itself as a reliable partner in authentication—making it easier for you to manage users while you concentrate on innovating and expanding your services.

---

For more details about their features, customer stories, or to request a demo, visit [PropelAuth](https://www.propelauth.com).
